title: What are product development and launching? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the world of software, development is the creation and “launching” is delivery to market. The first is “getting a product on the shelf” and the second is getting the product off the shelf. Here’s the flow: identify a market and discover problems that we are able to solvedocument the market and problems in a business case to show how solving the problem will result in benefits to the organizationform a “product team” of developers and designers to create a solution to the problemcontinually validate the solution using prototypes or examples to ensure that we’re solving the problem in a way customers will embraceform a “launch team” to plan the product introduction—including its messaging, key selling benefits, necessary sales and customer evaluation toolsgather feedback from early adopters to determine what changes need to be made to the product or its promotionperform a process retrospective to determine what worked and what can be improvedRepeatThe business and product planning is typically called product management, the creation is called product development, and the delivery to market is often product marketing.
